title: Light Side

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select two players. One will be used as trust, one will be converted to the Town. 2 uses, only one convertee can be active.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your first target **must** be Town. If they aren't, you die and your will is wiped.
- Your second target will gain the Town win condition until you die, even if they're already Town.
- If your convertee dies to their original faction, you and your active first target die.
